content.title: Welcome to the world of GH360
Welcome to the World of GH360, your near shore tourism service partner
content.description: Founded 2012 fully operational since 2013 we offer tailor made business solutions for the big players in tourism industry. GH360 provides you with a range of services such as simple customer care to more complex accounting as well as development. All in one for your convenience and satisfaction.

content.title: Founded 2012 fully operational since 2013 we offer tailor made business solutions for the big players in tourism industry

years.title: GH Dialog was founded in 2013
years.description: From the cooperation between Lukas Rütschi and Rainer Götz

years.title: Acquisition of the customer Unister and thus strategic alignment: Tourism
PCI DSS full certification
years.description: Growth to 80 FTE, acquired 7 Travel customers and Kuoni Swiss AG

years.title: Schmetterling Reisen International is won as a customer
years.description: Expansion of cooperation with Kuoni to include Helvetictours.ch and Lastminute.ch

years.title: FTI is acquired as a customer. Kurz mal weg.de extends the contract,
At the end of the year GH Dialog has 240 employees
years.description: Invia Travel (formerly Unister) and GH Dialog conclude a sales agreement for the creation of a new location in Tirana. With Sunways, the first 24/7/365 shifts are started. Driveboo and LMX are added as travel providers with Dertouristik Suisse (Kuoni) and Schmetterling Reisen together.

GH Dialog has 240 employees spread over 2 locations. The first 24/7/365 shifts are started in cooperation with TUI up with the parallel department. GH Dialog ends the year with Sunways and TUI Austria among our customers.

years.title: At the end of the year GH Dialog has 240 employees
years.description: Invia Travel (formerly Unister) and GH Dialog conclude a sales agreement for the creation of a new location in Tirana. With Sunways, the first 24/7/365 shifts are started. Driveboo and LMX are added as external providers with Dertouristik Suisse (Kuoni) and Schmetterling Reisen.
